title: Love your new apartment home! Beautiful 2 bedroom floorplans.
posting_body: ['Welcome to Reserve at Thornton I & II Apartments!', '9700 Welby Rd Thornton, CO 80229', 'Rental Size:', '2 BR - 2 BA - 1035 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1528 |', 'Lease Length:', '12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Inside your apartment home you will find even more to love!', 'Our spacious floorplans give you plenty of room for all your furniture and decorations so that you can make it your own.', "You'll love your kitchen complete with new appliances and a breakfast bar.", 'Breathe in some fresh air without leaving your apartment with an attached balcony/patio.', "You'll also enjoy wall-to-wall carpeting, air conditioning, mirrored closets, and more.", "After you've browsed through our website, stop by or call to schedule a tour today!", 'Our community features:', '➢ 2 Playgrounds', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Community Room', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Grill', '➢ Picnic Area', '➢ Pool', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Online Payments', '➢ On-site Maintenance', '➢ On-site Management', '➢ Self-Guided Tours', 'Our unit features:', '➢ Large Bedrooms', '➢ New Appliances', '➢ Storage', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Mirrored Closets', '➢ Plush Wall-to-Wall Carpet', '➢ Private Patio/Balcony', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'Reserve at Thornton Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', 'Please contact the leasing office for more information on pet deposits, fees and rent.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Security Properties', 'This is an affordable community.', 'Income & student restrictions apply, please contact the leasing office for pricing, information and guidelines.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '3F1BC1D275334563']
